Articles.Content:
Based on my - primitive - concepts of aerodynamics and the observations made playing badminton, I came to one conclusion: The form of the wheel of badminton is aerodynamically very stable, so ... Why not make a heat shield to be deployed , raising a barrier wall similarly to this?

What do you think?

Can any of you do it?
Sure, but why not have it in stock?

Sure, but why not have it in stock?

I don't know if its such a godd idea, with a mod to have it... Its enough to me

There is http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98178-NASA-Adaptable-Deployable-Entry-Placement-Technology-%28ADEPT%29-by-OLDD-%2826-04-14%29

Its a good model bu ti weren't talking abou that, i was talking about something not-a-faring and not-an-aeroshell, an intermediate thing, that will prevent of damage parts like batteries,
Thats why there are cargo pods to put things in and shield them plus make it look nice.
